Name: Batida de Carneval
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
BLEND all ingredients with 7oz scoop of crushed ice.
Review: So thick and fruity this easy, smoothie-style drink is something of a meal in itself - a three-course dessert that is.
History: The Batida (meaning 'shake') is a traditional Brazilian drink and 'Carneval' means mango in Portuguese, the official language of Brazil.
Nutrition: One serving of Batida de Carneval contains 234 calories
